mapper.select: SELECT ZIP AS zip, ADDRESS AS address, DETAIL_ADDRESS AS detailAddress, NAME AS receiver, TEL_NO AS tel FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT ob.BOOK_NO AS bookNo, b.BOOK_TITLE AS bookTitle, b.BOOK_COVER AS bookCover, ob.BOOK_COUNT AS bookCount, ob.ORDER_PRICE AS orderPrice, ob.DISCOUNT_PRICE AS discountPrice, ob.REFUND_YN AS refundYn FROM ORDER_LIST ob JOIN BOOK b ON ob.BOOK_NO = b.BOOK_NO WHERE ob.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" ( ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_COUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, DELIVERY_FEE, PAYMENT_STATUS, USER_ZIP, USER_ADDRESS, USER_DETAIL_ADDRESS, USER_TEL_NO, USER_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, CURRENT_DATE, #{orderCount}, #{totalPrice}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{userZip}, #{userAddress}, #{userDetailAddress}, #{userTelNo}, #{userName} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_LIST ( ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOOK_NO, BOOK_COUNT, ORDER_PRICE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, REFUND_YN ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{memberNo}, #{bookNo}, #{bookCount}, #{orderPrice}, #{discountPrice}, DEFAULT )
